channel.title: CVE Feed for Pyramid Solutions -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Pyramid Solutions -- all products

item.title: CVE-2022-1737|2024-08-03T00:16:58.997Z -- pyramid%20solutions -- ethernet%2Fip%20adapter%20development%20kit%20%28eadk%29
item.description: Pyramid Solutions' affected products, the Developer and DLL kits for EtherNet/IP Adapter and EtherNet/IP Scanner, are vulnerable to an out-of-bounds write, which may allow an unauthorized attacker to send a specially crafted packet that may result in a denial-of-service condition.
